title: MD
biography: K. M. Shaji is an Indian politician belonging to the Indian Union Muslim League. He is the president of Muslim Youth League in Kerala, a secretariat member of the League, and the treasurer of the Muslim League parliamentary party.
aiSummary: K. S. Shaji is a dementia research specialist with an H-index of 134 at Psychiatry (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Oncology, Nature Reviews Disease Primers, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
